1100001011001010 1000101011111010 1 -> sum: 0100110111000101, cout: 1

0110101000100010 1000011001001100 1 -> sum: 1111000001101111, cout: 0

1001111110011110 1101110101101110 1 -> sum: 0111110100001101, cout: 1
0100111111100101 0110111110011011 1 -> sum: 1011111110000001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
